comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Applies a set of damage to an entity.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Additional options about the source of damage, which may add additional effects or spur additional behaviors on this entity.

comments.name: returns
comments.value:
Whether the entity takes any damage.
This can return false if the entity is invulnerable or if the damage applied is less than or equal to 0.
